revised_title: Anatomy of Ductless Glands in Chick Development
tldr: The author, Henry Gray, examines the development of the ductless glands in chicks, specifically the spleen, supra-renal, and thyroid glands. He demonstrates their evolution and the tissues they are composed of, establishing their classification as ductless glands. The study also refutes existing theories about the spleen's function and blood-disc formation and destruction.
